name: Capital Ring (section 03) - alternative avoiding steps in

ai.summary: A 0.3 km easy section of the Capital Ring (Section 03) designed to avoid stairs, providing a short, flat route suitable for most walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat pavement and well-maintained footpaths; minimal elevation with occasional small uneven patches; this variant avoids steps entirely.
ai.safety_notes: Even on a short, step-free route, stay alert for road crossings and other pedestrians. Surface conditions can vary with weather. Wear comfortable footwear, bring water, and check daylight hours and weather conditions before starting.
ai.best_seasons: All year round; best in spring and autumn for milder weather and lighter crowds.

seo.title: Capital Ring (Section 03) – Accessible Route (UK)
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy, step-free section of the Capital Ring in the UK. This 0.3 km route is flat and suitable for pedestrians, wheelchairs, and strollers.
